title: Step 12

challengeFiles.name: main
challengeFiles.contents:
def verify_card_number(card_number):
    sum_of_odd_digits = 0
    card_number_reversed = card_number[0:4]
    print(card_number_reversed)
    
def main():
    card_number = '4111-1111-4555-1142'
    card_translation = str.maketrans({'-': '', ' ': ''})
    translated_card_number = card_number.translate(card_translation)

    print(translated_card_number)

    verify_card_number(translated_card_number)

main()

    card_number_reversed = card_number[0:4]
    print(card_number_reversed)
    
def main():
    card_number = '4111-1111-4555-1142'
    card_translation = str.maketrans({'-': '', ' ': ''})
    translated_card_number = card_number.translate(card_translation)

    print(translated_card_number)

main()

tests.text: You should have card_number_reversed = card_number[0:4:2] within the verify_card_number function.

description: Change card_number_reversed to be every second digit of the first four digits of card_number.
